I removed "copolymer" from the list of entities, as it is not a material name, but rather a description of the material's composition.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Here are the valid entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| μ e | 6 x 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |

The "current on/off ratio" (I on/I off) is not a measure of a material property, but rather a performance metric of the device made from the material. Therefore, it has been excluded from the table.
